column2: she  was  satisfied  that  the  2nd  Respondent  Trade  Union  was 'an  Association  or  a
combination of workmen' falling within the meaning of the said Ordinance,
the  interpretation  of  the  term  'workmen'  in  the  Ordinance  is  wide  enough  to
encompass the members of the 2nd Respondent Trade Union, i.e. Insurance Agents,
there is no statutory provision which outright prohibits and/or prevents her from
recognizing insurance agents as 'workmen' under the Ordinance.
